languages.text: "Об очень, очень деликатном деле... Видите ли, вы побывали у Наместника Владайма. Почти наверняка он обращался к вам с вопросом организации поставок на Футфол. Протекторат фон Валанциус славится изобилием своего основного {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}агромира{/g}, Януса. Было бы странно, если бы Владайм не уцепился за такую возможность, когда Футфол на пороге голода".

"A matter of the utmost delicacy... You see, you've been to the residence of the Liege. Vladaym almost certainly appealed to you for assistance in the arrangement of shipments to Footfall. The von Valancius protectorate is famed for the abundance of its main {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}agri-world{/g}, Janus. It would be odd for him not to seize on such an opportunity when Footfall is on the verge of famine."
languages.original_text: "Об очень, очень деликатном деле... Видите ли, вы побывали у Наместника Владайма. Почти наверняка он обращался к вам с вопросом организации поставок на Футфол. Протекторат фон Валанциус славится изобилием своего основного {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}агромира{/g}, Януса. Было бы странно, если бы Владайм не уцепился за такую возможность, когда Футфол на пороге голода".

traits.locale_text: "About a certain extremely delicate matter... You see, you've been to the residence of Liege Vladaym. He almost certainly appealed to you for assistance in the arrangement of shipments to Footfall. The von Valancius trade empire is famed for the abundance of its main agri world, Janus. It would be odd of Vladaym not to grasp at such an opportunity when Footfall is on the verge of famine."

languages.text: 「極めてデリケートな問題についてお話ししたく…あなたは領主の邸宅を訪問したことがおありでしょう。ヴラダイムがフットフォールへの輸送手配の援助をあなたに訴えたかと思われます。フォン・ヴァランシウス家の保護領は、主要惑星である{g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}農業惑星{/g}ヤヌスの豊かさで有名です。フットフォールが飢餓に瀕している今、彼がこのような機会を逃すはずがありません」
languages.original_text: "A matter of the utmost delicacy... You see, you've been to the residence of the Liege. Vladaym almost certainly appealed to you for assistance in the arrangement of shipments to Footfall. The von Valancius protectorate is famed for the abundance of its main {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}agri-world{/g}, Janus. It would be odd for him not to seize on such an opportunity when Footfall is on the verge of famine."

traits.locale_text: 「極めてデリケートな問題についてお話ししたく…あなたは領主の邸宅を訪問したことがおありでしょう。ヴラダイムがフットフォールへの輸送手配の援助をあなたに訴えたかと思われます。フォン・ヴァランシウス家の保護領は、主要惑星である{g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}農業惑星{/g}ヤヌスの豊かさで有名です。フットフォールが飢餓に瀕している今、彼がこのような機会を逃すはずがありません」

languages.text: “是件极其微妙的事情……您看，您拜访了总督的宅邸，而弗拉迪姆几乎明确地请求您协助安排运往落脚港的货物。冯·瓦兰修斯王朝正是由于{g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}农业世界{/g}加努斯的物产丰富而赫赫有名。因此，当落脚港即将陷入饥荒时，弗拉迪姆也自然想抓住这样的机会。”
languages.original_text: "A matter of the utmost delicacy... You see, you've been to the residence of the Liege. Vladaym almost certainly appealed to you for assistance in the arrangement of shipments to Footfall. The von Valancius protectorate is famed for the abundance of its main {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}agri-world{/g}, Janus. It would be odd for him not to seize on such an opportunity when Footfall is on the verge of famine."

traits.locale_text: “是件极其微妙的事情……您看，您拜访了总督的宅邸，而弗拉迪姆几乎明确地请求您协助安排运往落脚港的货物。冯·瓦兰修斯王朝正是由于{g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}农业世界{/g}加努斯的物产丰富而赫赫有名。因此，当落脚港即将陷入饥荒时，弗拉迪姆也自然想抓住这样的机会。”

languages.text: «Un asunto de suma discreción... Verá, ha estado en la residencia del Señor. Vladaym casi recurre a usted para que le ayudara a organizar sus cargamentos hacia Paso. El protectorado de los von Valancius es conocido por lo fructífero de su {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}mundo agrícola{/g} principal, Janus. Me extrañaría que no aprovechara una oportunidad semejante estando Paso al borde de la hambruna».
languages.original_text: "A matter of the utmost delicacy... You see, you've been to the residence of the Liege. Vladaym almost certainly appealed to you for assistance in the arrangement of shipments to Footfall. The von Valancius protectorate is famed for the abundance of its main {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}agri-world{/g}, Janus. It would be odd for him not to seize on such an opportunity when Footfall is on the verge of famine."

traits.locale_text: «Un asunto de suma discreción... Verá, ha estado en la residencia del Señor. Vladaym casi recurre a usted para que le ayudara a organizar sus cargamentos hacia Paso. El protectorado de los von Valancius es conocido por lo fructífero de su {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}mundo agrícola{/g} principal, Janus. Me extrañaría que no aprovechara una oportunidad semejante estando Paso al borde de la hambruna».

languages.text: « D'un sujet pour le moins délicat... Vous vous êtes {mf|rendu|rendue} dans la résidence du suzerain, ce qui signifie que Vladaym a très certainement requis votre assistance pour mettre en place des livraisons de vivres à destination de Castel. Le protectorat des von Valancius est célèbre pour son {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}agri-monde{/g} particulièrement fertile, Janus. Il serait étonnant qu'il n'ait pas voulu profiter de cette opportunité alors que la famine menace Castel. »
languages.original_text: "A matter of the utmost delicacy... You see, you've been to the residence of the Liege. Vladaym almost certainly appealed to you for assistance in the arrangement of shipments to Footfall. The von Valancius protectorate is famed for the abundance of its main {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}agri-world{/g}, Janus. It would be odd for him not to seize on such an opportunity when Footfall is on the verge of famine."

traits.locale_text: « D'un sujet pour le moins délicat... Vous vous êtes {mf|rendu|rendue} dans la résidence du suzerain, ce qui signifie que Vladaym a très certainement requis votre assistance pour mettre en place des livraisons de vivres à destination de Castel. Le protectorat des von Valancius est célèbre pour son {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}agri-monde{/g} particulièrement fertile, Janus. Il serait étonnant qu'il n'ait pas voulu profiter de cette opportunité alors que la famine menace Castel. »

languages.text: "Es geht um eine höchst delikate Angelegenheit ... Ihr wart ja in der Residenz des Lehnsherren. Vladaym hat ziemlich sicher um Eure Unterstützung bei der Organisation von Lieferungen nach Footfall ersucht. Das Protektorat von Valancius ist bekannt für den Überfluss auf seiner wichtigsten {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}Agrarwelt{/g}, Janus. Es wäre ungewöhnlich für ihn, eine derartige Gelegenheit nicht zu nutzen, wenn Footfall am Rand einer Hungersnot steht."
languages.original_text: "A matter of the utmost delicacy... You see, you've been to the residence of the Liege. Vladaym almost certainly appealed to you for assistance in the arrangement of shipments to Footfall. The von Valancius protectorate is famed for the abundance of its main {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}agri-world{/g}, Janus. It would be odd for him not to seize on such an opportunity when Footfall is on the verge of famine."

traits.locale_text: "Es geht um eine höchst delikate Angelegenheit ... Ihr wart ja in der Residenz des Lehnsherren. Vladaym hat ziemlich sicher um Eure Unterstützung bei der Organisation von Lieferungen nach Footfall ersucht. Das Protektorat von Valancius ist bekannt für den Überfluss auf seiner wichtigsten {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}Agrarwelt{/g}, Janus. Es wäre ungewöhnlich für ihn, eine derartige Gelegenheit nicht zu nutzen, wenn Footfall am Rand einer Hungersnot steht."

languages.text: "Üst düzey hassasiyet gerektiren bir mevzu var... Emîr'in konağına teşrif ettiniz. Vladaym'ın, Binliman'a nakliyatlar hususunda desteğinizi talep ettiğine şüphe yok. Sonuçta von Valancius protektorası, ana {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}zirai dünya{/g} Janus'un bolluğu, bereketiyle nam salmış. Binliman kıtlığın eşiğindeyken böyle bir fırsatı tepmesi aptallık olurdu."
languages.original_text: "A matter of the utmost delicacy... You see, you've been to the residence of the Liege. Vladaym almost certainly appealed to you for assistance in the arrangement of shipments to Footfall. The von Valancius protectorate is famed for the abundance of its main {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}agri-world{/g}, Janus. It would be odd for him not to seize on such an opportunity when Footfall is on the verge of famine."

traits.locale_text: "Üst düzey hassasiyet gerektiren bir mevzu var… Bildiğiniz üzere Emîr'in ikametgâhına gitme şerefine nail oldunuz. Vladaym'ın, Binliman nakliyatları konusunda desteğinizi talep ettiğine hiç şüphe yok. Sonuçta von Valancius Protektorası, ana {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}zirai dünya{/g} Janus'un bolluğu, bereketiyle nam salmış. Binliman, kıtlığın eşiğindeyken böyle bir fırsatı tepmesi aptallık olurdu."
